FuncDef: This command enables BGP graceful restart helper procedures (the "receiving router" role defined in the standard) for address families included in the GR capabilities of both peers. In a VPRN, SR OS can support GR helper functionality for IPv4, IPv6, label-ipv4, flow-ipv4 (IPv4 flow-spec) and flow-ipv6 (IPv6 flow-spec) routes.
